actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend section 3101 of title 38, United Code to prevent consideration of proceeds of, or transfer of proceeds of, U. S. Government Life Insurance and National Service Life Insurance for Federal estate tax purposes.

summary.text: Provides that the proceeds of, or transfer of proceeds of, United States Government Life Insurance and National Service Life Insurance shall not be considered for Federal estate tax purposes.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 3101 of title 38, United Code to prevent consideration of proceeds of, or transfer of proceeds of, U. S. Government Life Insurance and National Service Life Insurance for Federal estate tax purposes.
